title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Customized Online Learning for Improving Lecture Engagement and Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education theories and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze LMS data within two weeks to explain correlations between individual attendance patterns and learning outcomes
Learners can complete at least 80% of personalized learning activities over four weeks while improving lecture participation rates by 30%
Learners can revise weekly learning plans based on peer feedback to improve final assessment scores by at least 15%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
